name: 320-install-samba
description: Install and configure Samba for a given mountpoint and user, with Time Machine support. Calls install-samba.sh with template variables.

commands.description: Install and configure Samba for a given mountpoint and user, with Time Machine support. Calls install-samba.sh with template variables.

parameters.name: mountpoint
parameters.description: The mountpoint to share via Samba.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for the Samba user.

notes: All parameters must be set and not empty. The script is idempotent, configures Time Machine support, and outputs errors to stderr.
